whatIs.title: What are Dicipoints?
whatIs.description:
Context on Dicilo.net: The digital currency of our trust-based ecosystem designed to enhance user engagement.

Dicipoints are the official reward points of the Dicilo ecosystem. Members earn them by engaging with the platform: sharing authentic recommendations, participating in product presentations, or referring new users to the club. Your Dicipoints grant you access to 'Fairbrowcam' benefits, including special discounts with trusted partners, early access to innovations, and entries into our exclusive seasonal prize draws.

benefits.page_subtitle: We are more than just a recommendation platform. We are a growing community that values quality, trust, and mutual benefit.

size.title: Size isn't everything, quality is
size.description: We focus on offering a select group of businesses you can trust, rather than an overwhelming number of options.

experience.title: Experience that speaks for itself
experience.description: With over 30 years of experience in marketing and business development, we know how to connect businesses and customers in a meaningful way.

two_reasons.title: Two great reasons to be part of Dicilo
two_reasons.description: Whether you are a business looking to grow or a user searching for quality, Dicilo gives you the tools and community you need.

item1.title: Direct access to engaged customers
item1.description: Reach an audience that is actively looking for high-quality products and services.

item2.title: Powerful marketing tools
item2.description: From personalized landing pages to targeted advertising campaigns, we give you everything you need to succeed.

item3.title: Strengthen your brand
item3.description: Being associated with Dicilo is a seal of quality that generates trust and credibility among consumers.

item1.title: Authentic and verified recommendations
item1.description: Say goodbye to fake reviews. Every business on Dicilo is carefully selected.

item2.title: Exclusive benefits and discounts
item2.description: As a member of the Dicilo club, you will get access to special offers that are not available anywhere else.

item3.title: Be part of a community
item3.description: Share your experiences and help others make the best decisions, while being rewarded for your contribution.

network.title: A network that grows with you
network.description: Our platform is designed to evolve with you. The more you participate, the more benefits you receive. We grow together, creating a unique ecosystem of trust and collaboration.
network.cta_text: Are you ready to take the next step?

social.title: Join our digital community
social.description:
Follow us on social media to stay up to date with the latest news, exclusive offers, and community events.
We are on WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, YouTube, X (Twitter), Twitch, and Pinterest.

carla.name: Carla S.
carla.quote: Thanks to Dicilo, I've discovered unique local businesses that I would never have found otherwise. The exclusive discounts are a fantastic bonus!

tomas.name: Tomás R.
tomas.quote: My customer base has grown significantly since I registered my business on Dicilo. The platform has helped me connect with customers who truly value what I do.

lucia.name: Lucía M.
lucia.quote: It's great to be part of a community that values quality and authenticity. Every recommendation I find is top-notch.

dicicoinPage.title: What is DICICOIN?
dicicoinPage.intro:
DICICOIN is a physical, commemorative, and collectible coin representing the birth and vision of the Dicilo ecosystem.
It is not a cryptocurrency or a traditional financial product, but a tangible symbol of belonging to a community that is building new ways of connection, recommendation, and growth between people and businesses.
dicicoinPage.unique: Each DICICOIN is a unique, numbered, limited piece, created for those who decide to be part of the project from its early stages.
dicicoinPage.specialDesc:
DICICOIN unites the physical world with a long-term digital vision.
Owning a coin means being present from the start, supporting an idea before it becomes a standard, and participating in the construction of an ecosystem based on trust, perseverance, and collective growth.

The coin is not only kept as a collector's item but also represents a strategic position within Dicilo, linked to its future evolution.
dicicoinPage.howToTitle: What do I need to get a DICICOIN?
dicicoinPage.howToDesc:
The first step is to register for free on Dicilo.
Registration allows identifying the holder, guaranteeing the authenticity of the coin, and officially becoming part of the community.

Once registered, you will be able to access the acquisition of DICICOIN through official channels within Dicilo.
dicicoinPage.messageTitle: A message for those who look ahead
dicicoinPage.messageDesc:
DICICOIN is not for everyone.
It is for those who believe in ideas built step by step, for those who understand the value of being there first, and for those who wish to be part of something that grows with meaning and purpose.

Registering on Dicilo and acquiring a DICICOIN is a simple way to say:
“I was there from the beginning.”
